meanings.definition: The state of being an unmarried man.
meanings.sent1: His bachelorhood meant he had no wife.
meanings.sent2: In his bachelorhood, he enjoyed living alone.
meanings.sent3: His friends teased him about his eternal bachelorhood.
meanings.sent4: The freedom of bachelorhood was like a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent5: The loneliness of bachelorhood echoed in his empty apartment.

meanings.definition: The state of being a bachelor.
meanings.sent1: He embraced bachelorhood and focused on his career.
meanings.sent2: Bachelorhood allowed him to come and go as he pleased.
meanings.sent3: His family joked about his commitment to bachelorhood.
meanings.sent4: The responsibilities of marriage seemed distant in his bachelorhood.
meanings.sent5: The simplicity of bachelorhood was both comforting and challenging.
